verses.verse: I am sought<WH1875> of them that asked<WH7592> not<WH3808> for me; I am found<WH4672> of them that sought<WH1245> me not:<WH3808> I said,<WH559> Behold<WH2009> me, behold<WH2009> me, unto<WH413> a nation<WH1471> that was not<WH3808> called<WH7121> by my name.<WH8034>

I have spread out<WH6566> my hands<WH3027> all<WH3605> the day<WH3117> unto<WH413> a rebellious<WH5637> people,<WH5971> which walketh<WH1980> in a way<WH1870> that was not<WH3808> good,<WH2896> after<WH310> their own thoughts;<WH4284>

A people<WH5971> that provoketh me to anger<WH3707> <WH853> continually<WH8548> to<WH5921> my face;<WH6440> that sacrificeth<WH2076> in gardens,<WH1593> and burneth incense<WH6999> upon<WH5921> altars of brick;<WH3843>

Which remain<WH3427> among the graves,<WH6913> and lodge<WH3885> in the monuments,<WH5341> which eat<WH398> swine's<WH2386> flesh,<WH1320> and broth<WH4839> of abominable<WH6292> things is in their vessels;<WH3627>

Which say,<WH559> Stand<WH7126> by<WH413> thyself, come not near<WH5066> <WH408> to me; for<WH3588> I am holier<WH6942> than thou. These<WH428> are a smoke<WH6227> in my nose,<WH639> a fire<WH784> that burneth<WH3344> all<WH3605> the day.<WH3117>

Behold, <WH2009> it is written<WH3789> before<WH6440> me: I will not<WH3808> keep silence,<WH2814> but<WH3588> <WH518> will recompense,<WH7999> even recompense<WH7999> into<WH5921> their bosom,<WH2436>

Your iniquities,<WH5771> and the iniquities<WH5771> of your fathers<WH1> together,<WH3162> saith<WH559> the LORD,<WH3068> which<WH834> have burned incense<WH6999> upon<WH5921> the mountains,<WH2022> and blasphemed<WH2778> me upon<WH5921> the hills:<WH1389> therefore will I measure<WH4058> their former<WH7223> work<WH6468> into<WH413> their bosom.<WH2436>

Thus <WH3541> saith<WH559> the LORD,<WH3068> As<WH834> the new wine<WH8492> is found<WH4672> in the cluster,<WH811> and one saith,<WH559> Destroy<WH7843> it not;<WH408> for<WH3588> a blessing<WH1293> is in it: so<WH3651> will I do<WH6213> for my servants' sakes,<WH4616> <WH5650> that I may not<WH1115> destroy<WH7843> them all.<WH3605>

And I will bring forth<WH3318> a seed<WH2233> out of Jacob,<WH4480> <WH3290> and out of Judah<WH4480> <WH3063> an inheritor<WH3423> of my mountains:<WH2022> and mine elect<WH972> shall inherit<WH3423> it, and my servants<WH5650> shall dwell<WH7931> there.<WH8033>

And Sharon<WH8289> shall be<WH1961> a fold<WH5116> of flocks,<WH6629> and the valley<WH6010> of Achor<WH5911> a place for the herds<WH1241> to lie down in,<WH7258> for my people<WH5971> that<WH834> have sought<WH1875> me.

But ye<WH859> are they that forsake<WH5800> the LORD,<WH3068> that forget<WH7913> <WH853> my holy<WH6944> mountain,<WH2022> that prepare<WH6186> a table<WH7979> for that troop,<WH1408> and that furnish<WH4390> the drink offering<WH4469> unto that number.<WH4507>

Therefore will I number<WH4487> you to the sword,<WH2719> and ye shall all<WH3605> bow down<WH3766> to the slaughter:<WH2874> because<WH3282> when I called,<WH7121> ye did not<WH3808> answer;<WH6030> when I spoke,<WH1696> ye did not<WH3808> hear;<WH8085> but did<WH6213> evil<WH7451> before mine eyes,<WH5869> and did choose<WH977> that wherein<WH834> I delighted<WH2654> not.<WH3808>

Therefore <WH3651> thus<WH3541> saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD,<WH3069> Behold,<WH2009> my servants<WH5650> shall eat,<WH398> but ye<WH859> shall be hungry:<WH7456> behold,<WH2009> my servants<WH5650> shall drink,<WH8354> but ye<WH859> shall be thirsty:<WH6770> behold,<WH2009> my servants<WH5650> shall rejoice,<WH8055> but ye<WH859> shall be ashamed: <WH954>

Behold, <WH2009> my servants<WH5650> shall sing<WH7442> for joy<WH4480> <WH2898> of heart,<WH3820> but ye<WH859> shall cry<WH6817> for sorrow<WH4480> <WH3511> of heart,<WH3820> and shall howl<WH3213> for vexation<WH4480> <WH7667> of spirit.<WH7307>

And ye shall leave<WH5117> your name<WH8034> for a curse<WH7621> unto my chosen:<WH972> for the Lord<WH136> GOD<WH3069> shall slay<WH4191> thee, and call<WH7121> his servants<WH5650> by another<WH312> name: <WH8034>

That he who<WH834> blesseth himself<WH1288> in the earth<WH776> shall bless himself<WH1288> in the God<WH430> of truth;<WH543> and he that sweareth<WH7650> in the earth<WH776> shall swear<WH7650> by the God<WH430> of truth;<WH543> because<WH3588> the former<WH7223> troubles<WH6869> are forgotten,<WH7911> and because<WH3588> they are hid<WH5641> from mine eyes.<WH4480> <WH5869>

For, <WH3588> behold,<WH2009> I create<WH1254> new<WH2319> heavens<WH8064> and a new<WH2319> earth:<WH776> and the former<WH7223> shall not<WH3808> be remembered,<WH2142> nor<WH3808> come<WH5927> into<WH5921> mind.<WH3820>

But <WH3588> <WH518> be ye glad<WH7797> and rejoice<WH1523> forever<WH5704> <WH5703> in that which<WH834> I<WH589> create:<WH1254> for,<WH3588> behold,<WH2009> I create<WH1254> <WH853> Jerusalem<WH3389> a rejoicing,<WH1525> and her people<WH5971> a joy.<WH4885>

And I will rejoice<WH1523> in Jerusalem,<WH3389> and joy<WH7797> in my people:<WH5971> and the voice<WH6963> of weeping<WH1065> shall be no<WH3808> more<WH5750> heard<WH8085> in her, nor the voice<WH6963> of crying.<WH2201>

There shall be<WH1961> no<WH3808> more<WH5750> thence<WH4480> <WH8033> an infant<WH5764> of days,<WH3117> nor an old man<WH2205> that<WH834> hath not<WH3808> filled<WH4390> <WH853> his days:<WH3117> for<WH3588> the child<WH5288> shall die<WH4191> a hundred<WH3967> years<WH8141> old;<WH1121> but the sinner<WH2398> being a hundred<WH3967> years<WH8141> old<WH1121> shall be accursed.<WH7043>
And they shall build<WH1129> houses,<WH1004> and inhabit<WH3427> them; and they shall plant<WH5193> vineyards,<WH3754> and eat<WH398> the fruit<WH6529> of them.

They shall not<WH3808> build,<WH1129> and another<WH312> inhabit;<WH3427> they shall not<WH3808> plant,<WH5193> and another<WH312> eat:<WH398> for<WH3588> as the days<WH3117> of a tree<WH6086> are the days<WH3117> of my people,<WH5971> and mine elect<WH972> shall long enjoy<WH1086> the work<WH4639> of their hands.<WH3027>

They shall not<WH3808> labor<WH3021> in vain,<WH7385> nor<WH3808> bring forth<WH3205> for trouble;<WH928> for<WH3588> they<WH1992> are the seed<WH2233> of the blessed<WH1288> of the LORD,<WH3068> and their offspring<WH6631> with<WH854> them.
And it shall come to pass,<WH1961> that before<WH2962> they call,<WH7121> I<WH589> will answer;<WH6030> and while they<WH1992> are yet<WH5750> speaking,<WH1696> I<WH589> will hear.<WH8085>

The wolf<WH2061> and the lamb<WH2924> shall feed<WH7462> together,<WH259> and the lion<WH738> shall eat<WH398> straw<WH8401> like the bullock:<WH1241> and dust<WH6083> shall be the serpent's<WH5175> meat.<WH3899> They shall not<WH3808> hurt<WH7489> nor<WH3808> destroy<WH7843> in all<WH3605> my holy<WH6944> mountain,<WH2022> saith<WH559> the LORD.<WH3068>
